00019    /* 
00020    * Default constructor.
00021    */
00022    HarmonicTether::HarmonicTether()
00023     : nTetherType_(0)
00024    {
00025       for (int i=0; i < MaxNTetherType; ++i) {
00026          kappa_[i] = 0.0;
00027       }
00028    }
00029 
00030    /* 
00031    * Copy constructor.
00032    */
00033    HarmonicTether::HarmonicTether(const HarmonicTether& other)
00034     : nTetherType_(other.nTetherType_)
00035    {
00036       for (int i = 0; i < nTetherType_; ++i) {
00037          kappa_[i] = other.kappa_[i];
00038       }
00039    }
00040 
00041    /* 
00042    * Assignment.
00043    */
00044    HarmonicTether& HarmonicTether::operator = (const HarmonicTether& other)
00045    {
00046       nTetherType_ = other.nTetherType_;
00047       for (int i = 0; i < nTetherType_; ++i) {
00048          kappa_[i] = other.kappa_[i];
00049       }
00050       return *this;
00051    }
00052 
00053    /* 
00054    * Read bond interaction parameters from file
00055    */
00056    void HarmonicTether::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00057    {
00058       readBegin(in, "HarmonicTether");
00059       read<int>(in, "nTetherType", nTetherType_);
00060       if (nTetherType_ > MaxNTetherType) {
00061          UTIL_THROW("nTetherType_ > MaxNTetherType");
00062       }
00063       readCArray<double>(in, "kappa",  kappa_,  nTetherType_);
00064       readEnd(in);
00065    }
00066 
00067 }
